amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section requiring a report on campaign donations from the oil and gas industry.

action.text: Mr. Armstrong raised a point of order against the Tlaib amendment (A068). Mr. Armstrong stated the provisions of the amendment exceeds the scope of the bill and the amendment is therefore, not germane. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A068) offered by Ms. Tlaib.
